question_text_en: What is the maximum Z coordinate of an object which is a subclass of Decor that an agent looks at in the livingroom for less than or equal to 17 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT (MAX(?pos_z) as ?answer) WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:lookAt .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration <= 17)
} }
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Decor .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
}

qualifiers_en.time: less than or equal to 17 seconds

question_text_en: From when to when is an agent turning an object whose state is OFF in the livingroom?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?begin_time ?end_time WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:turnTo .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:OFF .
} }
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
} limit 1

PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?begin_time ?end_time WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:drink .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Alcohol_1 .
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
} limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Alcohol_1
qualifiers_en.question: From when to when?

question_text_en: How long does it take for an agent to close an object whose attribute is has_plug in the kitchen?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_plug .
} }
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
?event vh2kg:time ?time .
?time time:numericDuration ?answer .
} limit 1

question_text_en: What is the previous activity involving an agent that opens an object which is a subclass of Appliances in the kitchen for less than or equal to 20 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:open .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration <= 20)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Appliances .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
?activity vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
?answer vh2kg:nextActivity ?activity .
} limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.time: less than or equal to 20 seconds
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Appliances
qualifiers_en.question: What is the previous activity?

paraphrased_question_text_en: What was the activity before the agent opened an appliance in the kitchen for 20 seconds or less?

question_text_en: What is the next activity involving an agent that pours an object whose state is CLOSED in the kitchen from 2024-04-12T07:45:00 to 2024-04-27T22:21:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-12T07:45:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-04-27T22:21:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:CLOSED .
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
?activity vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
?activity vh2kg:nextActivity ?answer .
} limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose state is CLOSED
qualifiers_en.question: What is the next activity?

paraphrased_question_text_en: After the agent poured a closed object in the kitchen between 7:45 a.m. on April 12, 2024, and 10:21 p.m. on April 27, 2024, what did he do next?

?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .

?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-12T22:47:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-07-02T14:30:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
} }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:first ?size_x .
filter(?size_x <= 0.39)
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
?object2 rdfs:label "bathroom" .
?activity vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
?activity vh2kg:nextActivity ?answer .
} limit 1

query:

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:find .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:CLEAN .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
} order by asc(?begin_time) }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
} limit 1

PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a vh2kg:Faucet .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-08T02:40:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-04-29T09:48:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
}  }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOn .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Electronics .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-18T03:39:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-05-25T02:55:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
}  }
?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
} limit 1

qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Electronics

question_text_en: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object put in by an agent that is a subclass of Potato_1 in less than or equal to 18 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:putIn .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Potato_1 .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration <= 18)
}  }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
} limit 1

PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:turnTo .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a ?objectType .
?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Electronics .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
} order by desc(?end_time) }
?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
} limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Electronics
qualifiers_en.question: What is the place?

paraphrased_question_text_en: Where is the location where the agent is currently turning toward an electronic device?

question_text_en: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object scrubbed by an agent that is of type Toothpaste firstly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?object a vh2kg:Toothpaste .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
} order by asc(?begin_time) }
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
} limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose type is Toothpaste
qualifiers_en.question: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object?

paraphrased_question_text_en: What are the 3D coordinates of the toothpaste that was scrubbed by an agent?

question_text_en: What is the place where an agent squeezes an object whose state is CLOSED for more than or equal to 17 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:squeeze .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:CLOSED .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration >= 17)
}  }
?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
} limit 1

question_text_en: What is the place where an agent lastly scrubs an object whose height is greater than or equal to 0.34m?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
filter(?size_y >= 0.34)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
} order by desc(?end_time) }
?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
} limit 1

query:

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:state vh2kg:OFF .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
} order by asc(?begin_time) }
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
filter(?size_y <= 0.73)
?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
FILTER(?duration >= 10)
}  }
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "bathroom" .
?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>

PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
filter(?size_y >= 0.04)
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
} }
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-04-29T00:06:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-04T10:14:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
} limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?size_x ?size_y ?size_z WHERE {
{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:type .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
} order by desc(?end_time) }
?event vh2kg:place ?place .
?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
} limit 1

qualifiers_en.question: What are the width, height, and depth of the object?

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

{ select * where {
?event vh2kg:action ac:putIn .
?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
FILTER("2024-05-06T20:10:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-05-26T18:18:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
}  }
